type.name: T:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBarTransitionMode
type.summary: Defines the animation of appearing and disappearing of the control .

field.name: F:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBarTransitionMode.Fade
field.summary: The control changes it's opacity from 0% to 100%.

field.name: F:Elysium.Controls.ApplicationBarTransitionMode.Slide
field.summary: The control slowly appears out of the lowest side of the window.
